ImyaTweaks.Title: Custom Buff Values for the modified Polar Circle and Tundra Item Sets in Zoo and Arctic Zoo.
ImyaTweaks.Description: Use the panels below to fine tune your experience.

Standard.Name: normal enclosure to arctic in Arctic
animal arctic_enclosure to normal in OW/NW/Africa
normal animal enclosures to arctic in Arctic

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Additional Output Amount from Polar Circle Set Buff in other Sessions
ImyaExpose.Description: Sets the values for the Polar Circle Set Buff in all other sessions. It grants additional output of Arctic Gas for all Oil Wells [in 1/x cycles].

English.Text: Boosts production of cloths in other sessions.

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Productivity Increase from Tundra Set Buff for all tailors in other Sessions
ImyaExpose.Description: Sets the values for the Tundra Set Buff in all other sessions. It increases productivity [in %].

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Additional Output Amount from Tundra Set Buff for all tailors in other Sessions
ImyaExpose.Description: Sets the values for the Tundra Set Buff in all other sessions. It grants additional output of Parkas for other clothing industries [in 1/x cycles].

English.Text: Reduces the costs of Airship Construction.

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Construction Cost Reduction for Tundra Set Buff in Arctis
ImyaExpose.Description: Sets the values for the Tundra Set Buff in the Arctis. It reduces costs needed for Airship construction in the Arctis. [in %]

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Construction Time Reduction for Tundra Set Buff in Arctis
ImyaExpose.Description: Sets the values for the Tundra Set Buff in the Arctis. It reduces time needed for Airship construction in the Arctis. [in %]

English.Text: Boosts production of cloths in other sessions.
